review:
It appears similar to aaitraaz film. With little twist.. Priyanka role being played by karishma.. Iskadar hum bhi tum pe martey hai tum ko dulhan banayengay hum mere jeevan saathi.....
I still remember this movie poster beside bharat music system store. I thought to watch that movie in theatre in 2006 but couldn't that.. 03 /06 /19
Karisma Kapoor's acting is amazing. Overall cute movie with cute songs.

This movie is really best movie.
One Should really watch this movie starring Akshay Kumar, Karishma Kapoor and Amisha Patel.
i realy love this movie and all my favorite actor and actresses
Terrific performance by karishma kapur love this movie
It a very emotional movie & very inspiring watching after movie
Fabulous film love you akki Sir
